StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetConstraintData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TableName sysname AS
SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(40), CONST.name) AS [CONSTRAINT], CASE CONST.xtype WHEN 'C' THEN 'CHECK' WHEN 'D' THEN 'DEFAULT' WHEN 'F' THEN 'FOREIGN KEY' WHEN 'PK' THEN 'PRIMARY KEY' WHEN 'UQ' THEN 'UNIQUE' END + ' CONSTRAINT' AS CONSTRAINT_TYPE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), COALESCE(@TableName + '.' + COL.name, SPACE(0))) AS [COLUMN], CASE CONST.xtype WHEN 'C' THEN (SELECT COALESCE(COM.TEXT, SPACE(0)) FROM SYSCOMMENTS COM WHERE COM.ID = CONST.ID) WHEN 'F' THEN 'REFERENCES ' + (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), LTRIM(RTRIM(R.NAME)) + '.' + LTRIM(RTRIM(RCOL.NAME))) FROM SYSFOREIGNKEYS FK INNER JOIN SYSOBJECTS R ON R.ID = FK.RKEYID INNER JOIN SYSCOLUMNS RCOL ON (R.ID = RCOL.ID AND FK.RKEY = RCOL.COLID) WHERE FK.CONSTID = CONST.ID) ELSE SPACE(0) END AS CONSTRAINT_DATA, O.* FROM SYSOBJECTS O INNER JOIN SYSCONSTRAINTS C ON (O.NAME = @TableName AND O.ID = C.ID) INNER JOIN SYSOBJECTS CONST ON C.CONSTID = CONST.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYSCOLUMNS COL ON (C.ID = COL.ID AND C.COLID = COL.COLID AND COL.name != 'rowguid') ORDER BY [CONSTRAINT]
